name: MoneyQuiz
0:
”Alexa, open money quiz”
”Alexa, start money quiz”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: money quiz
des:
Hi! Everyone can and should learn about finance and economics because money is needed to survive! This Alexa skill will be periodically updated with additional money concepts. Enjoy!

Tips:
- Speak Clearly.
- While playing the quiz, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next question. 
- At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the quiz.

You will challenge yourself by learning about: 
- The purpose of money
- Credit and debt
- Inflation and deflation
- Supply and demand 
- Mercantilism 
- Loans and interest 
- Reserve currency
- Fiat currency and the gold standard
- Roth IRA
- More...

Money Quiz was created by Matthew Kristopher Frazier.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
